alert.note: Alert for Corozal; Naranjito (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 15 at 6:50PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following , Corozal and Naranjito. * WHEN...Until 800 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams. Water over roadways. River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 648 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated additional light to moderate rainfall. Flooding is already occurring in the advisory area. Between 1 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are expected over the area. Mudslides and flooding of small rivers have been reported. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
